ygData.subject: Re: New Weapon Sketches!
ygData.msgSnippet: been meaning to explore OOT for a while, so went searching for them, but never found them...mebbe start on that deepsea diving expedition i been thinkin about
ygData.messageBody:
been meaning to explore OOT for a while, so went searching for them, but
never found them...mebbe start on that deepsea diving expedition i been
thinkin about :)

if you get any info on which island, what npc, and what time of day, let us
know so we can start workin on figgering out the recipes...

Xillitil/Povar


>From: "Light Bulb" <bulblight@...>
>
>Any of you guys have any information about the new Pottery weapon sketches
>that were found? I was reading about them on the eqvault trade board and
>it
>seems that several people have found weapon sketches for pottery that were
>implemented with the new pottery changes. From what I've heard, they were
>found on an npc on a remote island in the Ocean of Tears. Seems there are
>a
>good variety of different sketchs...all weapons. Nobody that i know of has
>successfully made the items that the sketches fashion yet, because the
>materials are unknown as of yet. It is also not known whether they
>actually
>make weapons themselves or that they make molds that can then be used for
>blacksmithing (which seems more likely of the two). I'd love to hear any
>additional information anyone may have! This could be a breakthrough for
>us
>potters =)
>
>---- Greiger Matheson
>
